page.title: 05SPORT IN S.HARRIS
page.content: {FOOTBALL _}Harris have their own football club.Their opponents are many other teams from the Isle of Lewis. Their home ground is called The Rally Park in Tarbert.The football club is sponsored by Rodel Hotel.In school we play a lot of football during intervals and we have a competition called the Mackie Cup.The Mackie Cup was named after a bank manager. {SWIMMING _}There is a training pool in Tarbert.The pool is open on Saturdays in the summer to the public and on week days it is open to the schools. The pool is between 10 to 15 metres in length and about 4 to 5 metres in breadth.It is only 70 to 75 cm deep. {BADMINTON_}The Badminton club meets in the school during the winter. We occasionally play matches against other schools.At the end of the year we have a party. {
